scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../part3/phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy: cp -r * ../../../fullstack-production && cd ../../../fullstack-production && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && cp -r * ../../../fullstack-production && cd ../../../fullstack-production && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
